name: E.O.D SwipeBeat
description:
Game Description:
E.O.D SwipeBeat is a tile-based rhythm game developed for mobile devices. Players would be swiping the tiles according to the beat and corresponding colors or shapes, while the color of tiles will change between each beats.

Story Summary:
E.O.D SwipeBeat set in a retro-futurism world, a terrorist organisation had planted techno-bombs all across the E.D.Metropolis. You are a professional Trance DJ hired by the government for your talent to be a new member of the explosive ordnance disposal squad (E.O.D). You must use your electro-music composing talent to the test and save Metropolis!

Music:
We do not own the music and sounds, if there's any issues with the licenses and anything. Feel free to contact.
(Please noted that this is a uni project prototyping and for portfolio showcase only, not making money)

Feel free to play our prototype in your mobile!!!

ANDDDDDDDD here is Team SwipeCore:
